attributes.action: immediately freeze the Installation of more Mobile Phone Masts, until such time as these dangers can be scientifically and properly assessed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: “We members of the public are very concerned by the potential Health Threat Dangers posed by the Radiation-Emitting Pods on Mobile Phone Masts and Buildings.  This Petition calls for the Government to immediately freeze the Installation of more Mobile Phone Masts, until such time as these dangers can be scientifically and properly assessed. We also call for the Government to commission up-to-date, comprehensively detailed and wholly independent research into these Health Concern Dangers : subsequently to amend current policy and guidelines.”
